content: This stream to be used for any discussion related to IHE profiling of FHIR.

Hi @John Moehrke ,
thanks for creating the IHE stream, I think that's a good idea.
There is currently a lively discussion going on in the ITI community concerning "ATNA logging for IHE FHIR profiles", would this be a good topic for this stream aswell or is this more an internal ITI discussion?
Many thanks for creating this 'stream'.. ..I hope it will become a 'big river' asap.

Thanks from IHE to @Michel Rutten for fantastic tutorial on Forge and Simplifier. I hope to inspire the IHE body to request IHE organization to leverage and support these tools, so that we can be better discovered and understood.
Yes, thank you, @Michel Rutten . It was greatly appreciated.
Thank you for inviting me @Elliot Silver. Feel free to contact me if you have any more questions or comments concerning FHIR profiling. Cheers!
